name: Tomy: Whenever I See Women, I See Tigers
name_original: Tomy: Whenever I See Women, I See Tigers
description:
"Whenever I See Women, I See Tigers" exhibited at VMoMA (Virtual Museum of Modern Art) 

"Whenever I See Women, I See Tigers" is a museum tour where the audience/player gets to experience a rare exhibit of the late, mysterious Banksy-esque artist and painter named "Tomy." 

In this exhibit, the audience will be able to learn more about Tomy's life through the many works throughout his life. 

Controls:

A & D : Movement

Mouse-click when prompted.

Written, designed & engineered by Ivan Tsang - website - twitter

Sounds downloaded from Soundsnap.org

Many thanks to Richard Lemarchand from USC Games. Photos courtesy from Flickr, "Internet Archive Book Images."
